review: It does not work as expected. Service outside of USA is very poor. Netflix service does not work with my existing account I have to suscibirme Through Amazon
author: Kenneth Lobo Méndez

review: Outstanding, easier to set up that Chromecast, remote is intuitive, functionality very good, Amazon does a great job all around
author: Carl B.

review: We love our Fire TV Stick! It literally turned our television into a Smart TV!
author: Harry Strahlendorf "P47Harry"

review: I'm an Amazon Prime customer and just got a new 50" TV for Christmas that has a USB port built in.  Ordered the Amazon Fire TV stick so watch prime movies, etc.  Delivered super fast.  Set-up was extremely easy and video instructions were included.  My husband has been watching some of his favorite movies and shows.  Would recommend this item without any reservations.
author: Ruth A. Corcoran "Ruth C."

review: Great, easy to install, lots of variety for viewing.
author: Kim Workman

review: Easy to set-up and operate. Excellent selections for any viewing desires
author: George E. Wetsell

review: I placed it right next to our wifi and it still wouldn't stream.
author: Ellen Broad

review: Great little product I got as a gift for Christmas. Works very nicely and is relatively simple to setup.
author: Nick Mcpherson
